TopicTitle: This isn't about rocketry, but I think someone at Dreamworks knows the "Kerbal Way"

Articles.Content:
This is all fine and dandy, but one thing comes to mind...

WE NEED A FULL-LENGTH KSP ANIMATED MOVIE SOME DAY

WE NEED A FULL-LENGTH KSP ANIMATED MOVIE SOME DAY

This, so much. Jeb and his pals Bill and Bob saving the Kerbol System from the fearsome Kraken, which is intent on plunging the system into eternal darkness. May I suggest Jeb be played, or voiced, by Bruce Willis? *ducks and runs*
I think just trying to get to the Mun for the first time would have more than enough hilarity in it for a Kerbal film.
